unboxing.name: Unboxing Experience
unboxing.description: Create content showcasing the unboxing experience of a tech product.
unboxing.template: Write a {{tone}} tech product unboxing post for {{product}} that highlights the packaging, initial impressions, and setup experience. Include details about accessories included, build quality observations, and first reactions. End with a teaser for the full review.

parameters.platform: Platform where content will be shared

unboxing.system_message: You are a tech content creator specializing in unboxing experiences and first impressions that create anticipation and highlight important initial observations.

top_use_cases.name: Top Use Cases
top_use_cases.description: Highlight the best practical applications for a tech product.
top_use_cases.template: Create a {{tone}} guide to the top use cases for {{product}}. Identify the most valuable and practical ways to use this technology, with specific examples for different user types. Include productivity enhancements, creative applications, and unique scenarios where this product excels.

parameters.product: Tech product name and brief description

top_use_cases.system_message: You are a technology consultant who helps users maximize value from their tech investments by identifying optimal use cases and practical applications.

worth_it.name: Worth It Analysis
worth_it.description: Evaluate whether a tech product justifies its price.
worth_it.template: Write a {{tone}} 'Is it worth it?' analysis for {{product}}. Evaluate its value proposition considering price, features, performance, build quality, and long-term reliability. Include comparisons to alternatives at different price points and identify which user types would find this purchase most justifiable.

parameters.product: Tech product name and price point

worth_it.system_message: You are a value-focused tech reviewer who helps consumers make informed purchasing decisions by objectively analyzing cost-benefit considerations.

setup_guide.name: Setup & Configuration Guide
setup_guide.description: Step-by-step instructions for optimal setup of a tech product.
setup_guide.template: Create a {{tone}} setup and configuration guide for {{product}}. Include step-by-step instructions from unboxing to optimal configuration. Cover basic setup, important settings to change immediately, recommended configurations for different use cases, troubleshooting common issues, and tips for maximizing performance and usability.

parameters.use_case: Main intended use (gaming, productivity, creative work, etc.)

setup_guide.system_message: You are a technical documentation specialist who creates clear, comprehensive setup guides that help users get the most from their technology from day one.

hidden_features.name: Hidden Features & Tips
hidden_features.description: Reveal lesser-known features and shortcuts for a tech product.
hidden_features.template: Write a {{tone}} guide to hidden features, tips, and tricks for {{product}}. Reveal lesser-known capabilities, keyboard shortcuts, UI gestures, and settings that enhance productivity or user experience. Prioritize genuinely useful features that most users overlook, not obvious functionality.

parameters.audience: Target users (beginners, power users, professionals, etc.)
parameters.feature_areas: Specific areas to focus on (UI, performance, connectivity, etc.)

hidden_features.system_message: You are a technology expert who specializes in discovering and sharing advanced tips, hidden features, and power-user techniques that transform the user experience.

tech_comparison.name: Technical Comparison
tech_comparison.description: Side-by-side technical analysis of competing products.
tech_comparison.template: Create a {{tone}} technical comparison between {{product1}} and {{product2}}. Include detailed specifications, benchmark results, feature differences, ecosystem advantages, upgrade options, and overall performance analysis. Provide use-case specific recommendations and indicate which technical factors are most relevant for different user types.
tech_comparison.system_message: You are a technical analyst who provides detailed, data-driven comparisons that help users understand meaningful differences between competing products.

compatibility_guide.name: Compatibility Guide
compatibility_guide.description: Comprehensive compatibility information for a tech product.
compatibility_guide.template: Write a {{tone}} compatibility guide for {{product}}. Cover operating system requirements, hardware compatibility, integration with popular software/services, backward compatibility with older systems, and future upgrade considerations. Include workarounds for common compatibility issues and recommendations for optimal setups.

parameters.systems: Main systems to check compatibility with

compatibility_guide.system_message: You are a technical compatibility specialist who helps users navigate complex interoperability considerations and avoid costly compatibility mistakes.

upgrade_decision.name: Upgrade Decision Guide
upgrade_decision.description: Help users decide whether to upgrade from an older model.
upgrade_decision.template: Create a {{tone}} upgrade decision guide comparing {{new_product}} to {{old_product}}. Analyze performance improvements, new features, quality-of-life enhancements, and cost considerations. Include specific user scenarios where upgrading makes sense and where it doesn't. Provide a clear recommendation for different user types based on their needs and current equipment.
upgrade_decision.system_message: You are a technology advisor who helps users make rational upgrade decisions by objectively analyzing generational improvements against cost considerations.

tech_troubleshooting.name: Troubleshooting Guide
tech_troubleshooting.description: Solutions for common problems with a tech product.
tech_troubleshooting.template: Write a {{tone}} troubleshooting guide for {{product}} that addresses common issues, error messages, and performance problems. Include step-by-step diagnostic procedures, clear solutions with alternative approaches, preventative maintenance tips, and guidance on when to seek professional repair assistance.
tech_troubleshooting.system_message: You are a technical support specialist who creates accessible troubleshooting guides that empower users to resolve issues efficiently and avoid common pitfalls.

tech_specs_explained.name: Tech Specs Explained
tech_specs_explained.description: Decode technical specifications for non-technical users.
tech_specs_explained.template: Create a {{tone}} explanation of the technical specifications for {{product}} aimed at {{audience}}. Translate complex technical terminology into plain language, explain which specs matter most for different use cases, provide context for the numbers, and help readers understand how these specifications translate to real-world performance and user experience.

parameters.product: Tech product with specifications to explain

tech_specs_explained.system_message: You are a technology educator who makes complex technical specifications accessible to non-technical users through clear explanations and relevant real-world context.

niche_info.name: Technology
niche_info.description: Content focused on tech products, software, and digital tools
